name: World of Warships: Legends — Nimble De Grasse
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Nimble De Grasse
description:
Light some fires with De Grasse! She is a fast and capable cruiser with powerful guns and torpedoes. Just don't get hit!

De Grasse comes with 5 days of Premium, 10 Camos, and a pile of Commander XP.

This bundle contains: - De Grasse Tier V ship - 5 Days of Premium - 10 Hunter Camouflages - 37,000 Commander XP - Bonus: 10 Rare Commander XP Boosters

If you already have De Grasse, you'll receive compensation in the form of 10,000 doubloons. Content such as boosters, Commander XP, camos, etc. is only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
